title: Prohibits certain retaliatory personnel action by employers
summary: Prohibits retaliatory personnel action by an employer against an employee who discloses or threatens to disclose an activity, policy or practice of the employer or a fellow employee that is in violation of law; removes requirement that such violation of law present a substantial and specific danger to public health or safety.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to prohibiting certain retaliatory personnel action by employers
